## Exercise 1. Tibble and Data Import

1.1

```{r}
tribble(
  ~a, ~b, ~c,
  #--|--|----
  1, 2.1, "apple",
  2, 3.2, "orange"
)

tibble(
  a = 1:2,
  b = 2.1:3.2,
  c = c("apple", "orange")
)
```
